ORG-AFF: Organization-Affiliation contains: Employment Relation, from person to geo-political entity or organization; Ownership Relation: from person to organization; Founder Relation: from person or organization to organization or geo-political entity; Student-Alum Relation: from person to organization; Sports-Affiliation Relation: from person to organization; Investor-Shareholder Relation: from person or organization or geo-political entity to organization or geo-political entity; Membership Relation: from person or organization or geo-political entity to organization.
GEN-AFF: Gen-Affiliation contains: Citizen-Resident-Religion-Ethnicity Relation, from person to person or organization or location or geo-political entity; Org-Location-Origin Relation: from organization to location or geo-political entity.
PHYS: Physical contains: Located Relation, from person to facility or location or geo-political entity; Near Relation, from person or facility or location or geo-political entity to facility or location or geo-political entity.
PART-WHOLE: Part-whole contains: Geographical Relation, from facility or location or geo-political entity to facility or location or geo-political entity; Subsidiary Relation, from organization to organization or geo-political entity.
ART: Agent-Artifact contains: User-Owner-Inventor-Manufacturer Relation, from person or organization or geo-political entity to facility.
PER-SOC: Personal-Social contains: Business Relation, from person to person; Family Relation, from person to person; Lasting-Personal Relation, from person to person.
